(master) plate containing 20 representative colonies from the original transformation plate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","original_name":"3CEBF164-0B4D-49F4-83DD-75ED6B12537C.JPG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gqtt782e.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gqtr782e.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gqts782e.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gqtq782e.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lcsu","text":"Incubate the plate in a   incubator for 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fh9gn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"79660970941F11ECB24183E7283A23F8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"30","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jeie","text":"After 2 days, pick around 8 colonies from the re-streaked plate using the smallest micropipette tip or sterile wooden toothpick.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fml2","text":"Re-suspend the cells into   of    sodium hydroxide (NaOH) by twirling the pipette tip or wooden toothpick inside the NaoH solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1j3cf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"03895940942011ECB24183E7283A23F8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"ECA0F030941F11ECB24183E7283A23F8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qqhn","text":"Microwave the PCR tubes at the highest power setting for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"26rp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47rp7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5aos6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bsd2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3F704770942011ECB24183E7283A23F8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"581ul","text":"The tubes will be hot. Care should be taken while handling the tubes after microwaving.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmhom","text":"Take the PCR tubes out of the microwave oven and briefly spin to pellet down the cells using a bench-top centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5mpk","text":"Without disturbing the pellet, carefully aspirate   out of the tubes and use it as template for PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ds2v1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"7A2BADF0942011ECB24183E7283A23F8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fip6j","text":"The PCR reaction mix and the primer annealing temperatures can be adjusted depending on the polymerase and the primer pair used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Colony PCR for screening transgenic yeast
